attributes.action: Declare all religions and customs which are in direct contravention to UK law as illegal practices within the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many Religions and customs have practices which directly contravene UK Law (particularly in repect of Human Rights and Civil Liberties)and the European Convention of Human Rights. Any such religion or custom shuold be made illegal under English and European Law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
